```{r hu4_n, echo=FALSE, message=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)

library(LAGOSextra)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)

# setwd("tables")
ids <- test <- readRDS("../data/dt.rds") %>%
  group_by(hu4_zoneid) %>% 
  tally()

hu4 <-  LAGOSextra::query_gis("HU4", "ZoneID", ids$hu4_zoneid) %>%
  st_cast(to = "MULTIPOLYGON") %>%
  left_join(ids, by = c("ZoneID" = "hu4_zoneid"))

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = hu4, aes(fill = n)) +
  theme_minimal()
```
